text: Chris always looked up to David, they drifted apart at times, but always reconnect.
David influences me to be a better person.
David and Chris have gone on many snowmobile adventures.
David had a fianc√©e, but after they broke up he moved to Ottawa with me.
David and Chris lived together for a period while Chris was in school.
David worked for Primus, and then in sales at Apple.
